title: This is what you’re missing
author: VD
content_html: If you’re still not signed up for the Daily Meme Wars. This is actually a modest improvement on today’s Daily Meme, with an addition that unfortunately did not occur to me until after the daily mail went out to all 1,600 Meme Warriors.
